headline: Occidental’s CEO Wants Berkshire to Buy the Company. That Could Renew Talk of Deal.
summary: A Forbes article published Tuesday quoted Vicki Hollub, the oil company’s chief executive, as saying a buyout by Warren Buffett’s company “would be a dream come true.”

headline: Hess (HES) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
